title: Week 5 Liquidity Mining Proposal
body:
This marks the fifth week of liquidity mining on Balancer v2. The Ballers propose the following changes which will go into effect 00:00 UTC Monday, June 21st, 2021.

Allocate an additional Tier 2 slot for 5000 BAL to BAL/WETH 80/20
https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x5c6ee304399dbdb9c8ef030ab642b10820db8f56000200000000000000000014 This pool now gets 25,000 BAL per week total.

Upgrade from 2500 BAL to Tier 2 for 5000 BAL for USDC/WETH 50/50
https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x96646936b91d6b9d7d0c47c496afbf3d6ec7b6f8000200000000000000000019

Allocate two Tier 2 slots for 5000 BAL each slot and one Tier 3 slot for 2500 BAL, for a total of 12,500 BAL to AAVE/WETH v1 pool. 
https://pools.balancer.exchange/#/pool/0xc697051d1c6296c24ae3bcef39aca743861d9a81 *Note you must be staked in the Aave Safety Module to get BAL rewards.

Allocate one Tier 4 slot for 1000 BAL to each of the following two pools:

MATIC/WETH 50/50
https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0xa02e4b3d18d4e6b8d18ac421fbc3dfff8933c40a00020000000000000000004b

DPI/WBTC/WETH 1/3 each
https://app.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x61d5dc44849c9c87b0856a2a311536205c96c7fd000100000000000000000001

Link to pull request: https://github.com/balancer-labs/frontend-v2/pull/434
author: 0x512fce9B07Ce64590849115EE6B32fd40eC0f5F3
